title: #DataSecurityLoSCapabilities.v1_0_0.DataSecurityLoSCapabilities

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

Identifier.longDescription: The value identifies this resource.  The value shall be unique within the managed ecosystem.

SupportedMediaEncryptionStrengths.description: Supported key sizes for media encryption.
SupportedMediaEncryptionStrengths.longDescription: The enumeration literal shall specify supported key sizes in a symmetric encryption algorithm (AES) for media encryption.

SupportedChannelEncryptionStrengths.description: Supported key sizes for transport channel encryption.
SupportedChannelEncryptionStrengths.longDescription: The enumeration literal shall specify supported key sizes in a symmetric encryption algorithm (AES) for transport channel encryption.

SupportedHostAuthenticationTypes.description: Supported authentication types for hosts (servers) or initiator endpoints.
SupportedHostAuthenticationTypes.longDescription: The enumeration literal shall specify supported authentication types for hosts (servers) or initiator endpoints.

SupportedUserAuthenticationTypes.description: Supported authentication types for users (or programs).
SupportedUserAuthenticationTypes.longDescription: The enumeration literal shall specify supported authentication types for users (or programs).

SupportedSecureChannelProtocols.description: Supported protocols that provide encrypted communication.
SupportedSecureChannelProtocols.longDescription: The enumeration literal shall specify supported protocols that provide encrypted communication.

SupportedAntivirusScanPolicies.description: Supported policies that trigger an AntiVirus scan.
SupportedAntivirusScanPolicies.longDescription: The enumeration literal shall specify supported policies that trigger an AntiVirus scan.

SupportedAntivirusEngineProviders.longDescription: The entry values shall specify supported AntiVirus providers.

SupportedDataSanitizationPolicies.longDescription: The enumeration literal shall specify supported data sanitization policies.

SupportedDataSecurityLinesOfService.description: Collection of known and supported DataSecurityLinesOfService.
SupportedDataSecurityLinesOfService.longDescription: The collection shall contain supported DataSecurity service options.

DataSecurityLoSCapabilities.longDescription: This resource may be used to describe data security capabilities.
